text: allāh taṉ aruḷiṉāl taṅkaḷukkuk koṭuttirukkum poruṭkaḷil yār ulōpattaṉam ceykiṟārkaḷō atu tamakku nallatu eṉṟu (avarkaḷ) niccayamāka eṇṇa vēṇṭām - avvāṟaṉṟu! Atu avarkaḷukkut tīṅkutāṉ;. Avarkaḷ ulōpattaṉattāl cērttu vaitta (poruṭkaḷ) ellām maṟumaiyil avarkaḷ kaḻuttil arikaṇṭamāka pōṭappaṭum;. Vāṉaṅkaḷ, pūmi ākiyavaṟṟil (irukkum aṉaittukkum) aṉantara pāttiyatai allāhvukkē uriyatākum.
